Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply.  I will go because I want to live.  But I will hate every second.  Fair enough?
Posts.Title: I need encouragement to go to chemo on monday
I need encouragement to go to chemo on monday

Posts.Content: This is my first time posting.  A very good friend of mine that is a 7 yr breast cancer survivor told me about this site.  I have my 5th out of 6 chemos on Monday and I don't want to go.  I was so sick the last time and I feel so good today.  I know I will go but if someone has some wonderful words of wisdom, that has been thru it, I sure would appreciate it. Thank you
Posts.Title: I need encouragement to go to chemo on monday

Posts.Content: Losing my hair has been one of the difficult things about the chemo/cancer.  I cannot tell a lie.  Between the bald head and the weight gain, I'm a mess.  I'm in the middle of it now.  I think when it's all said and done and our hair grows back, along with our energy we will be better.  I hope so.  I cry often about my bald head.  I wish I was one of these women that can say bald is beautiful, but on me it is hideous.   I don't mean to be a downer, but it is what it is.  I am so looking forward to feeling fuzz on my head in a couple of months.  Good luck, my friend.
